AU Edge

I would sacrifice a lot to win Roses, but sometimes winning isn't the most important thing.

The Sporting Calendar is made up of a series of rivalries, but what is the point?

It is the history of the Roses fixture itself that makes it a rivalry. No one is exactly sure why they should hate Lancaster, pour out in droves and cheer for York until their throats feel hoarse - but they do.
